thread.title: New Technology Uses Robots To Write Textbooks

title: New Technology Uses Robots To Write Textbooks
text:
22 New Technology Uses Robots To Write Textbooks 
Tech Times: Are you ready for your daily sign that robots will become our overlords sooner rather than later? Good, because researchers at Penn State University have developed a new technology that helps faculty members create entire textbooks with the help of robots.
